16. Neural Networks and Deep Learning (2)

More Details on Feedforward Networks

Computation of Feedforward Networks (Review)

  • Network ë‚´ì˜ ê° nodeëŠ” unit (ë˜ëŠ” perceptron)ì´ë¼ ë¶ˆë¦¼
  • Unit ê³„ì‚°: (1) ì´ì „ nodeë“¤ë¡œë¶€í„°ì˜ ì…ë ¥ì— ëŒ€í•œ weighted sum ê³„ì‚°, (2) output ìƒì„±ì„ ìœ„í•œ ë¹„ì„ í˜• í•¨ìˆ˜ ì ìš©
  • aja_jajâ€‹ëŠ” unit jjjì˜ output, wijw_{ij}wijâ€‹ëŠ” unit iiiì—ì„œ jjjë¡œì˜ weight
  • ìˆ˜ì‹: aj=gj(âˆ‘iwijai)â‰¡gj(inj)a_j = g_j(\sum_i w_{ij} a_i) \equiv g_j(in_j)ajâ€‹=gjâ€‹(âˆ‘iâ€‹wijâ€‹aiâ€‹)â‰¡gjâ€‹(injâ€‹)
  • gjg_jgjâ€‹: unit jjjì™€ ì—°ê´€ëœ ë¹„ì„ í˜• activation function
  • injin_jinjâ€‹: unit jjjë¡œì˜ ì…ë ¥ì— ëŒ€í•œ weighted sum

Feedforward Networks with Another Notation

  • ì…ë ¥ ë³€ìˆ˜ x1,â€¦,xDx_1, \dots, x_Dx1â€‹,â€¦,xDâ€‹ì˜ MMMê°œ linear combinations êµ¬ì„±
  • aj=âˆ‘i=1Dwji(1)xi+wj0(1)a_j = \sum_{i=1}^D w_{ji}^{(1)} x_i + w_{j0}^{(1)}ajâ€‹=âˆ‘i=1Dâ€‹wji(1)â€‹xiâ€‹+wj0(1)â€‹,~ ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ j=1,â€¦,Mj = 1, \dots, Mj=1,â€¦,M ì´ê³  (1)ì€ ì²« ë²ˆì§¸ layer
  • wji(1)w_{ji}^{(1)}wji(1)â€‹: weights, wj0(1)w_{j0}^{(1)}wj0(1)â€‹: biases
  • aja_jajâ€‹: activations
  • ê° activation aja_jajâ€‹ëŠ” ë¯¸ë¶„ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ ë¹„ì„ í˜• activation function h(â‹…)h(\cdot)h(â‹…)ë¥¼ í†µí•´ ë³€í™˜
  • zj=h(aj)z_j = h(a_j)zjâ€‹=h(ajâ€‹), zjz_jzjâ€‹ëŠ” hidden units
  • Hidden units zjz_jzjâ€‹ëŠ” ë‹¤ì‹œ linear combination ë˜ì–´ output unit activations aka_kakâ€‹ë¥¼ ìƒì„±
  • ak=âˆ‘j=1Mwkj(2)zj+wk0(2)a_k = \sum_{j=1}^M w_{kj}^{(2)} z_j + w_{k0}^{(2)}akâ€‹=âˆ‘j=1Mâ€‹wkj(2)â€‹zjâ€‹+wk0(2)â€‹,~ ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ k=1,â€¦,Kk = 1, \dots, Kk=1,â€¦,K ì´ê³  KKKëŠ” ì´ output ìˆ˜
  • aka_kakâ€‹ëŠ” ì ì ˆí•œ activation functionì„ í†µí•´ network output yky_kykâ€‹ê°€ ë¨
  • Standard regression: Identity (yk=aky_k = a_kykâ€‹=akâ€‹)
  • Multiple binary classification: Logistic sigmoid function (yk=Ïƒ(ak)y_k = \sigma(a_k)ykâ€‹=Ïƒ(akâ€‹))
  • Multiclass classification: Softmax activation function (yk=expâ¡(ak)/âˆ‘lexpâ¡(al)y_k = \exp(a_k) / \sum_l \exp(a_l)ykâ€‹=exp(akâ€‹)/âˆ‘lâ€‹exp(alâ€‹))
  • ì „ì²´ network function (ì˜ˆ: sigmoid output):
  • yk(x,Â w)=Ïƒ(âˆ‘j=1Mwkj(2)h(âˆ‘i=1Dwji(1)xi+wj0(1))+wk0(2))y_k(\mathbf{x},~ \mathbf{w}) = \sigma(\sum_{j=1}^M w_{kj}^{(2)} h(\sum_{i=1}^D w_{ji}^{(1)} x_i + w_{j0}^{(1)}) + w_{k0}^{(2)})ykâ€‹(x,Â w)=Ïƒ(âˆ‘j=1Mâ€‹wkj(2)â€‹h(âˆ‘i=1Dâ€‹wji(1)â€‹xiâ€‹+wj0(1)â€‹)+wk0(2)â€‹)
  • w\mathbf{w}w: ëª¨ë“  weightì™€ bias parameterë¥¼ ê·¸ë£¹í™”í•œ vector
  • ì´ ê³¼ì •ì€ ì •ë³´ì˜ forward propagationìœ¼ë¡œ í•´ì„ ê°€ëŠ¥
  • Neural network model: ì…ë ¥ x={xi}\mathbf{x} = \{x_i\}x={xiâ€‹}ì—ì„œ ì¶œë ¥ {yk}\{y_k\}{ykâ€‹}ë¡œì˜ ë¹„ì„ í˜• í•¨ìˆ˜
  • Bias parameterëŠ” x0=1x_0 = 1x0â€‹=1ì¸ ì¶”ê°€ ì…ë ¥ ë³€ìˆ˜ x0x_0x0â€‹ë¥¼ ì •ì˜í•˜ì—¬ weight parameterì— í¡ìˆ˜ ê°€ëŠ¥
  • aj=âˆ‘i=0Dwji(1)xia_j = \sum_{i=0}^D w_{ji}^{(1)} x_iajâ€‹=âˆ‘i=0Dâ€‹wji(1)â€‹xiâ€‹
  • ë‹¨ìˆœí™”ëœ ì „ì²´ network function (2-layer bias í¬í•¨): yk(x,Â w)=Ïƒ(âˆ‘j=0Mwkj(2)h(âˆ‘i=0Dwji(1)xi))y_k(\mathbf{x},~ \mathbf{w}) = \sigma(\sum_{j=0}^M w_{kj}^{(2)} h(\sum_{i=0}^D w_{ji}^{(1)} x_i))ykâ€‹(x,Â w)=Ïƒ(âˆ‘j=0Mâ€‹wkj(2)â€‹h(âˆ‘i=0Dâ€‹wji(1)â€‹xiâ€‹))
  • Vector ë° matrices í™œìš© ì¶”ê°€ ë‹¨ìˆœí™”: y(x,Â w)=Ïƒ(W(2)h(W(1)x))\mathbf{y}(\mathbf{x},~ \mathbf{w}) = \sigma(\mathbf{W}^{(2)} h(\mathbf{W}^{(1)} \mathbf{x}))y(x,Â w)=Ïƒ(W(2)h(W(1)x))
  • Feedforward netsëŠ” ì¼ë°˜ì ìœ¼ë¡œ fully-connected

How to Count the Number of Layers in NNs

  • Neural networkì˜ layer ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚° ìš©ì–´ì— í˜¼ë€ ì¡´ì¬
  • 3-layer network: Unitì˜ layer ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì„¸ëŠ” ë°©ì‹ (inputì„ unitìœ¼ë¡œ ì·¨ê¸‰)
  • Single-hidden-layer network: Hidden unitsì˜ layer ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì„¸ëŠ” ë°©ì‹
  • Two-layer network: Network ì†ì„±ì„ ê²°ì •í•˜ëŠ” ë° ì¤‘ìš”í•œ adaptive weightsì˜ layer ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì„¸ëŠ” ë°©ì‹

Training of Feedforward Nets

Different Loss (Error) Functions for Different Problems

  • Regression
    • Output activation function: Identity (yk=aky_k = a_kykâ€‹=akâ€‹)
    • Loss (error) function: Sum-of-squares (L2 or squared) error function
    • E(w)=12âˆ‘n=1Nâˆ¥y(xn,w)âˆ’tnâˆ¥2E(\mathbf{w}) = \frac{1}{2} \sum_{n=1}^N \| \mathbf{y}(\mathbf{x}_n, \mathbf{w}) - \mathbf{t}_n \|^2E(w)=21â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nâ€‹âˆ¥y(xnâ€‹,w)âˆ’tnâ€‹âˆ¥2
  • Binary classification
    • Single target variable ttt (t=1t=1t=1ì€ C1C_1C1â€‹,~ t=0t=0t=0ì€ C2C_2C2â€‹)
    • Output activation function: Sigmoid y=Ïƒ(a)y = \sigma(a)y=Ïƒ(a)
    • Loss (error) function: Negative log likelihood ë˜ëŠ” cross-entropy error function
    • E(w)=âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N{tnlogâ¡yn+(1âˆ’tn)logâ¡(1âˆ’yn)}E(\mathbf{w}) = - \sum_{n=1}^N \{ t_n \log y_n + (1 - t_n) \log(1 - y_n) \}E(w)=âˆ’âˆ‘n=1Nâ€‹{tnâ€‹logynâ€‹+(1âˆ’tnâ€‹)log(1âˆ’ynâ€‹)},~ yn=y(xn,w)y_n = y(\mathbf{x}_n, \mathbf{w})ynâ€‹=y(xnâ€‹,w)
  • Multiclass classification
    • ê° inputì€ KKKê°œì˜ ìƒí˜¸ ë°°íƒ€ì ì¸ class ì¤‘ í•˜ë‚˜ì— í• ë‹¹
    • Target tkâˆˆ{0,1}t_k \in \{0, 1\}tkâ€‹âˆˆ{0,1}ëŠ” 1-of-K coding scheme ì‚¬ìš©
    • Network output í•´ì„: yk(x,Â w)=P(tk=1âˆ£x)y_k(\mathbf{x},~ \mathbf{w}) = P(t_k = 1|\mathbf{x})ykâ€‹(x,Â w)=P(tkâ€‹=1âˆ£x)
    • Output activation function: Softmax yk=expâ¡(ak)/(âˆ‘lexpâ¡(al))y_k = \exp(a_k) / (\sum_l \exp(a_l))ykâ€‹=exp(akâ€‹)/(âˆ‘lâ€‹exp(alâ€‹))
    • Loss (error) function: Negative log likelihood ë˜ëŠ” cross-entropy error function
    • E(w)=âˆ’âˆ‘n=1Nâˆ‘k=1Ktnklogâ¡yk(xn,w)E(\mathbf{w}) = - \sum_{n=1}^N \sum_{k=1}^K t_{nk} \log y_k(\mathbf{x}_n, \mathbf{w})E(w)=âˆ’âˆ‘n=1Nâ€‹âˆ‘k=1Kâ€‹tnkâ€‹logykâ€‹(xnâ€‹,w)
  • ìš”ì•½
    • ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜•ì— ë”°ë¼ output unit activation functionê³¼ matching error functionì˜ ìì—°ìŠ¤ëŸ¬ìš´ ì„ íƒ ì¡´ì¬

Information Theory (Review)

  • Entropy
    • Random variableì˜ ë¶ˆí™•ì‹¤ì„± ì²™ë„
    • H(X)=âˆ’Exâˆ¼P(X)[logâ¡P(x)]=Exâˆ¼P(X)[logâ¡1P(x)]H(X) = -\mathbb{E}_{x \sim P(X)} [\log P(x)] = \mathbb{E}_{x \sim P(X)} [\log \frac{1}{P(x)}]H(X)=âˆ’Exâˆ¼P(X)â€‹[logP(x)]=Exâˆ¼P(X)â€‹[logP(x)1â€‹]
  • Kullback-Leibler (KL) Divergence
    • ë™ì¼í•œ random variable XXXì— ëŒ€í•œ ë‘ í™•ë¥  ë¶„í¬ P(X)P(X)P(X)ì™€ Q(X)Q(X)Q(X)ê°€ ì–¼ë§ˆë‚˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ì§€ ì¸¡ì •
    • DKL(Pâˆ¥Q)=Exâˆ¼P(X)[logâ¡P(x)Q(x)]=Exâˆ¼P(X)[logâ¡P(x)âˆ’logâ¡Q(x)]D_{KL}(P \| Q) = \mathbb{E}_{x \sim P(X)}[\log \frac{P(x)}{Q(x)}] = \mathbb{E}_{x \sim P(X)}[\log P(x) - \log Q(x)]DKLâ€‹(Pâˆ¥Q)=Exâˆ¼P(X)â€‹[logQ(x)P(x)â€‹]=Exâˆ¼P(X)â€‹[logP(x)âˆ’logQ(x)]
  • Cross-entropy
    • H(P,Â Q)=âˆ’Exâˆ¼P(X)[logâ¡Q(x)]=H(X)+DKL(Pâˆ¥Q)H(P,~ Q) = -\mathbb{E}_{x \sim P(X)}[\log Q(x)] = H(X) + D_{KL}(P \| Q)H(P,Â Q)=âˆ’Exâˆ¼P(X)â€‹[logQ(x)]=H(X)+DKLâ€‹(Pâˆ¥Q)
    • QQQì— ëŒ€í•´ cross-entropyë¥¼ ìµœì†Œí™”í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì€ KL divergenceë¥¼ ìµœì†Œí™”í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒê³¼ ë™ì¼
